abstract: Stocks drop as investors shed phone company and utility shares.

headline.print_headline: Major Indexes Close Lower After Mixed Economic Signs
headline.main: Major Indexes Close Lower After Mixed Economic Signals

snippet: Consumer prices were unchanged in July, according to the Labor Department, while housing starts and industrial production were stronger than economists forecast....
lead_paragraph: Consumer prices were unchanged in July, according to the Labor Department, while housing starts and industrial production were stronger than economists forecast.
